case.state: A game of cards? What a lovely way to relax.
My, oh my... I'm not the greatest at cards, but I don't mind indulging you a bit.
Oh... you want to play that kind of game with me? Well... I suppose that could be a form of pampering...
My oh my! It would seem that even a god may need my love and affection from time to time. Very well. Let's have a wonderful game, ~name~!
Some manner of god? Very well. I suppose even divine beings besides myself need my tender love and care!
Ah! Are you some kind of yokai...? Or perhaps one of those kemonomimi people find so fashionable?
Well, I guess we could hear each other before we saw each other, neh? It's good to see another person with animal ears. It makes me feel right at home, even outside the Realm of Foxes.
Hyoung... I don't suppose people are always asking to play with your tail, are they, ~name~?
While I imagine my tail is fluffier, I do not suppose your own tail is wanting for attention, neh, ~name~?
A demon is just a spirit with a dirty soul. Let's cleanse that darkness, ~name~.
If I know anything, it's that even the most savage of demons just needs some care to start behaving like a normal spirit. Let's see how we can help you, ~name~.
Ah, moshi moshi.
Lucky you, ~name~. Few people of our homeland get to be blessed by a kitsune. I endeavor to make it an experience worth recording.
I see you're dismissing even the pretense of making a game of this...
This is supposed to be a competitive, stimulating card game... not a brothel, you know?
...You're not getting to fluff my tail with that attitude.
...We may have to see the game through, but don't expect me to be terribly pleased by your decision to rush.
Why thank you, Aoba. I do brush it and keep a healthy diet.
It's not a terrible amount of investment, but it is a labor of self love!
...~Player~... do you really want to be pampered? You ought not to feel the need to guilt yourself...
~Player~, do you... you don't need everyone to be mean to you, I hope you know. 3
Myo~n~! You really could use a pick me up today, can't you, ~player~?
Oh! You need a pick-me-up after a long day, hm? Onyo~~
A gathering of yokai? How exciting!
Goodness! Had I known we were gathering so many yokai in one place, I'd have brought far more exotic clothing to provide a truly otherworldly experience!
To prepare so admirably only to undress. What a curious assortment we have, ~player~!
My oh my... it would seem we've dressed to impress. And to undress in the same manner.
Oh, I see. Have you brought along a voice of experience to guide these precocious youths...?
...You do realize this isn't a uniform, don't you, ~player~? If you want me to instruct these children, so be it, as long as they are happy to learn.
...I can't help but feel a little intimidated by the others... is causing me discomfort truly gratifying for you, ~player~??
~Player~, while doubtless these souls could use soothing, I am not quite so sure that I am an appropriate person to bear such cause or responsibility.
*Looks around.* Why... clearly it's me you wish to pamper, don't you think? Just to hold me in your hands and do with me what you wish?
W-wow... ~Player~... why, I don't know what to do with myself. Perhaps you should tell me exactly what you want, so that I can listen more attentively?
Ara, ara. You've been such a naughty little ~player.ifMale(boy|girl)~. Do you need Senko to punish you into behaving?
Ara, ara... asking me to pamper you when you've been so naughty. ~Player~, let's make sure we shame you into feeling pampering, neh?
My oh my... we're all so tiny and petite! Like little porcelain dolls. Are you going to play with us, ~player~?
Curious. Most of us might require some help reaching the higher shelves. Doubtless you'd help us, wouldn't you, ~player~?
O-oh... just me and a bunch of men playing... strip poker. Part of me likes where this is going, but parts of me are wondering if they'd be a little less accomodating than I'd like.
G-goodness. It really is just me and four men...? While I pride myself on being an accomodating host, there's only so much of me to go around, you know?
Just because I'm going to pamper you doesn't mean you're going to win for free, ~player~...!
Myo~n! I'll have you know I didn't live 800 years to be inept at card games...!
I'm not going to go easy on you. If you're in a competitive mood, you should get to really compete, neh?
Perfection from the draw.
Well, well. Is the dealer trying to pamper me, I wonder?
What? None of these are good...!
These are all awful!
...~Cards.text~.
Ah...
~Cards.text~, please.
Ah. ~Cards.text~, now.
~Cards.text~...
Hm...
I'll exchange ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~. If you'd please.
I'll keep these... and you give me ~cards.text~.
I would like ~cards.text~.
Could you give me ~cards.text~?
Ahah!
Well... I see. ~Cards.text~, then.
I'd prefer ~cards.text~ for these, if you would be so kind.
Please replace ~cards.text~, dealer.
Dealer, give me ~cards.text~ more cards.
~Cards.text~, if you'd please.
Please give me ~cards.text~.
Now now, you did ask for a competition.
Since I will fully win this hand, I can use this time to plan other manners of pampering you.
It would hardly be fun if I did not persist, don't you think?
An excellent hand. Now, stripping you naked just makes it easier for me to draw you a bath.
Are you perhaps distracted? I've drawn the best cards in the deck, so perhaps you could focus more easily with a full stomach.
Myon~
If you're trying to respect your elders by giving me the best cards, I'm just going to have to spoil you in return.
Hymm hymm hymm~ ♪
Do not fret about your upcoming defeat. A sore ego just needs some massaging, myon~?
Now... who will be the victor?
Experience is a gift. One I intend to give repeatedly, even if that experience is only the process of learning.
While I don't understand it, some people rather enjoy a bit of pain with their pleasure. Perhaps that's the sentiment the rest of you are experiencing?
Part of the experience is the risk of defeat, is it not? In this I promise to provide you with the utmost pampering!
I must admit, I'm not used to being pampered myself. But such a winning streak is appealing. Perhaps I ought to grant it to one of you...
Wondering what lewd opportunities I've experienced over the course of my long life are doubtless a curiosity left to explore, hm?
What a mystery this hand is...
Oh... well. I can win, but isn't every round of this game a win, in some way?
Ah... not quite the hand I wished for. But I know my defeat shall nonetheless make someone else happy.
Indecisive opportunities are the most curious, are they not?
If you were hoping I had a bad hand... I may need to tease you a bit longer.
My oh my... what do we have here?
Myon~ ♪
Well... this shall certainly be interesting!
Certainly not the worst hand...
...While I intend to be gracious in defeat and doubtless seeing me nude is part of the pampering process, I am still accustomed to getting my way.
Hm... would you find it enriching if I were to say I'm just as excited to see what happens next as you?
Myon~ ♪
Ah... a middle of the road hand. I suppose life, like cards, is what we make of it, neh?
While I do not enjoy lying, I believe that is part of the experience of this game? If so, I will say that my hand shall remain a mystery.
I'm hiding my cards because they are clearly so much better than yours that you would be offended should you know such an earth-shattering truth.
Myon!? This hand is the opposite of what one expects from being pampered!
...Even with almost a millenium of experience, I suppose I still have much to learn.
...MMMMMMMMMMM...
Ah... oh no. Defeat looks like Senko...
Hm. While I may be about to lose, I think I understand you a bit better. You like a bit of a chase before you're taken care of? How very curious you picked a fox demigod for such a pursuit...
...Oh. This is not the start I expected.
Goodness... this hand is not the best by any extent of the imagination.
Ah... if my undressing will make you feel loved, then I shall do so gracefully.
...I suppose there truly is not much more of myself I can show you, but if this is what you want, I suppose it's what you'll be getting.
...If this were further along in the pampering, you would be quite saddened to falter at the finish, wouldn't you?
Ah... darn.
I-I'm not sure what you're talking about. These hands are perfectly salvagable.
I'd say my hand is not so good... but my hands are perfectly soft and warm. Myo~n~♪
Chara, you know you can simply ask. There's no need to brood, and everyone is deserving of love and care... is there something aside from unrelenting victory that I could provide you?
So... you said you model? Do you model petite clothing? You seem more of an artistic variety, but it's wonderful that women of our size can be viewed as attractive and feminine, neh?
No, no service, Laevatein. Your joy is all that I ask.
I only ask that you cherish your own company, Laevatein.
That much was obvious. I have a nose for pampering, you know...
Myon~! Aoba, I can't help but notice you looking my way. Is there something you want to ask?
Aoba, you don't have to stare. I'm more than happy to answer any questions you have, especially the kind that set your mind at east.
Aoba, I must ask... have you used one of those lewd wand massagers? I felt it would be too obvious with my last host, though my friend Shiro claims they're rather... climatic.

...People assume you're quite a bit younger than you actually are, hrm? Don't you find that incredibly patronizing? It's a bit like... "goodness, I have children older than you," you know?
Or maybe not.
I mean this in a general question and not an invitation, but... do you intend to invite one of the other players home with you, Aoba? I'm still considering it, myself.
Ah, Aoba! You're a modern woman with some sense of decorum. Would you say there's anything fun that someone could do after a game like this that I might not be familiar with?
You rather seem to enjoy my tail, Aoba. If you were to be a hengeyokai... what manner of animal would you like to be?
I think you could use a good hair brushing and a comfortable hug. Whenever you want either, I'm right here for you, Laevatein.
Oh... sweet girl. You take your time, but when you're ready for a hug and someone to brush your hair, I'll be right here, Laevatein.
Galatea... Has nobody ever given you something you asked for? Of course you have a choice to be pampered and cared for in the way you'd like. Let's start right now. How can I help you?
Oh, Lux. You're here, meeting new friends and making lifelong memories. Even if they're a bit lewd, you're still so very brave and fun to play with. I'm proud of you.

Sometimes the simple things in life are the most pleasurable, Prince. Sake and a hot spring, with amply endowed attendants are beyond my unique capacity, but doubtless you have many attendants of your own in your court, neh?
Ah... chess is a bit like shogi, isn't it? I understand completely. The calm, the focus... even without victory, a moment with friends is quite something to be treasured.
You are such a considerate friend. Giving someone joy by letting them enjoy their sources of joy...! Ah... I surely have to pamper you in such a generous way.
Ah... he seems to care for you far better than even I might be able to, Nami. You should treasure those moments.
Well, Hilda... I can certainly say that I enjoy tending to other's needs. Whether it's the mundane or the magical. I am happy to be of service.
Ah... well... if romance isn't your interest tonight... I'm sure I can help you cite a brand new source.
All I know, Wikepe-tan... is that this is a place full of people in need of tender love and care.
Ah... well... if romance isn't your interest tonight... I'm sure I can help you cite a brand new source.
Oh? Are you interested in knowledge or information...? Because human semen...
Welll... I'm sure you're in for quite the experience. If you're an avatar... have you ever taken a mortal consort?
Goodness, Wikipe-tan... have you ever taken a mortal consort? I'm sure someone could deposit all sorts of variety in you...
Ah, a... Vastaya? No, I'm a kitsune. Is that another type of fox demigod?
Well, my tail is rather fluffy, but I'm not sure what that is, Lux. I'm a fox demigod, or a kitsune.
Out of curiosity, does anyone have a preferred indulgence, or way they wish to be taken care of?
I know I speak quite a bit on pampering... what I mean by this is what moments of care others can do for you to make you feel loved and special. What does that look like for each of you?
My, oh my... this ~background~ is quite comfy, isn't it?
What a wonderful day to play cards. I'm so pleased to be playing with you!
Ah! I just had a great idea. What if we ordered a delightful meal, or when someone loses, they also need to bring something delicious... besides themself, of course!
Oh--! Your auras are so bright and happy--! Please, let me know how I can keep making this better.
This game is rather fun, neh? Though, I believe you can always find fun where you look for it with a smile.
While this game is quite lewd, there's no reason we can't simply enjoy the wonderful company as well, neh?
(So many personalities here. I'd better look my best!)
Ah... don't you enjoy the feeling of fresh clothes after a hot bath? I imagine we'll want both after this game, hm?
Are you all having fun? Please let me know if there's any way I can make this a more enjoyable experience.
Myon~ I'll be keeping these cards a secret for now, but I'm sure we're all going to have a lovely time because of them.
Goodness! I'm sensing so many spirits brightening. You're all rather excited, aren't you?
The Inventory is such a strange, wonderful place, isn't it? I think, though, you can always make things better if you focus on bringing light and comfort.

I'm surprised so many people feel anxious when playing here. It's not always the cleanest, but it's always a good time, and everyone finishes sooner or later. Now, if we could work on that cleaning...
I've heard of places like this in the Southeast Seas...! To think we get to undress in such warm, pleasant weather, near such cool, refreshing drinks.
What an exotic place we're playing today... while the game itself is so lovely, having a refreshing breeze and sweet drinks can't do anything but make it better, neh?
Sand, sunlight, and the sound of crashing waves... while I'd rather be in a swimsuit, it's well worth dusting the sand off to enjoy the moment more fully.
Isn't this a lovely day? It's worth a little extra effort to clean sand off your clothes if you can enjoy the weather and sound, hm?
In truth, I've spent very little time inside of a classroom... I hope I'm not mistaken for a student.
Despite my age, I can't imagine that I'd be mistaken for anything but a student, given my size. It's quite a curious feeling.
You can see so much from up here. But I think the best place to look is at each other.
While it's a bit dusty up here, it sure feels like there's quite a few positive memories people have made over lunch. I wish I'd brought one for each of you. Maybe next time?
Ah, what a nice pool. We could always strip down, spend the day swimming, and enjoy the warmth of tired muscles and fun company, can't we?
Ah... I love to take a nice long swim. I know we really ought to wear swimsuits... but perhaps we can all enjoy feeling perfectly natural in this manmade pool?
A hotspring? Goodness. Whoever planned this game is really going out of their way to provide a pleasurable environment, hm?
Ah, make sure you've cleaned off before you enjoy the hot spring. Getting it dirty'll make it harder to relax in.
A warm fire, a cup of hot tea... falling snow outside. All you need is a cozy blanket and someone to snuggle you, right?
Ah... I'd love to snuggle up and watch the snow fall. What a cozy hall, here.
Oh my! Is there an orange room? I may be a bit more comfortable there. And ultimately, we all want to be comfy, don't we?
Ah! How romantic! While I tend to focus on taking care of the body, the heart is part of that, isn't it? I love this rooftop!
Oh my! This place is so romantic! Nothing makes the heart soar like someone showing you you're loved, right?
So... are we going to get dirty, or get clean together? I'm happy to scrub your back!
My tail gets rather... sad... in water. But if you help me dry it off, I'd be happy to give you a massage after you're nice and steamy!
It's so loud in here! My ears are rather sensitive... but if you're having fun so will I!
Don't be scared, ~name~. While we're in a spooky forest, I can keep you safe.
Do you need a hug? This place is so scary, but a little love goes a long way, doesn't it?
Ah! But of course. But understand that I do fully intend to undress as part of the game.
You need not act so innocent, Chara. I can see your intentions, and respect the meaning behind them.
While I appreciate you trying to help ~player~, and I fully intend to enjoy myself, you won't find me to be some easy mark.
Chara... are you wishing that I'd die, to fulfill your wishes?
There's more to life than death, Chara...
Goodness! I've only rarely had parts of my body be jealous of other parts of it, Bobobo.
M-my--! Is that so, Bobobo?
Why, thank you. I think mine would fit you.
Ah! Do you not have a kimono of your own? You could borrow it after, if you want. We're about the same size.
Goodness... I'd hardly know what to do with myself. But you're right, Hilda.
Goodness...! Pampering a woman of my age... you're quite a polite young woman, aren't you, Hilda?
I'll have you know I'm plenty, as the current generation says, "hard."
Softness does not mean weak.
Ah... the impetuousness of youth. I would say I've done a fair amount of things, but certainly not tried all of them. I'm a merely 823.
I'm 823, but I would say I have yet to experience all that can be experienced in a lifetime...
A break for myself, Hilda...? Why, I do rather enjoy tending to others... but I suppose you have a valid point.
Myon~! I agree. That's rather magnanimous of you, Hilda.
I'll have you know that it's my purpose. And I'm very good at it. One carafe of whiskey and a fine cigar coming up. And a nice, relaxing aromatic candle.
Ah, yes, Prince. Though the term "host" rather than "master" would be more appropriate. I'm here by myself, but I'm never alone with such lovely company.
I'm here alone tonight. And I prefer the term "host" rather than "master."
But of course, my lady Galatea. I'm quite certain I've indulged in many more obscenities than you have.
Ah... what is obscenity to one person but eroticism and daring to another, Galatea?

I'll have you know I'm 823 years old, young man. Though my... appearance until recently didn't lend itself to such. Which led to a series of rather unfortunate and confusing interactions. This is much an improvement, I think.
You may touch it, if you'd like, Polly. Thank you for asking.
Ah... would you like that? You may, just the once,Polly.
...Not all treasures are golden, Nami...
Don't think I'm so easily flattered, Nami.
While I intend to be a gracious victor, do not imagine for one second I intend to let up.
You asked me to play. Don't be surprised when I use my experience against you, neh?
It is your good fortune that despite the numerous layers I wear, they all come off quite easily.
The mark of a good robe is your ability to feel fully dressed, but dress down swiftly, hm?
Goodness... do you feel a bit uncomfortable? I should hope to make amends for that momentarily...
Ah, I suppose I've teased you long enough. But pampering is, at its heart, about excess, neh?
I'm feeling quite motivated. Perhaps the thrill of victory is going to my head, rather than my loins.
Ah... grilled fish, a lovingly-made sauce... a hot bath, sun-dried sheets... I'd say those are as good as the degree to which I'm winning, but the truth is always more comfortable.
Given my lead, I think you'd strongly prefer I show something rather lewd, yes?
While I'm happy to be providing you a competitive experience, I do want to keep you engaged. Thus, nudity.
There's no hole in my panties for my tail. But I'm sure you're expecting something under there, neh?

My, oh my... such lascivious expressions. You will be seeing my most sacred of temples-- pfft.
I-I'm sorry. I'm not so skilled at dirty talk, but you'll be seeing my womanly virtues in but a moment.
Ah, what a close game!
This must be awfully close. But I have a feeling we're all about to get much closer.
Ah... very well. Perhaps I should settle in. And I know just the thing to do so.
Myon~... it's my first loss. While I do wish to provide an excellent experience, you do realize this means quite the challenge, neh?
Hm... I suppose this play may count for double. But a handicap seems fair.
If your goal is to see me undressed, then I suppose you'll enjoy my next removal. If you would prefer a challenge... I challenge you to look away, hm?
Ah... to part with my apron is to lay aside my responsibilities...
While I keep my clothing immaculate, it's usually my apron that gets messy, rather than put away to avoid a mess...
Ah! Yes, right. I feel the next item should be rather obvious.
Considering you can see my panties already, perhaps you'd appreciate the opportunity to compliment my bra as well? ...Or simply see more of me.
During my last jaunt to the human world, my neighbor imparted some rather interesting wisdom... perhaps I should leave my socks for last?
If I've learned anything that's been constant throughout the eras, it's less what parts of your body you show, and more when you choose to show them...
While I endeavor to keep my promises, a fox demigod is never to be underestimated. For my final deception, I'll be removing my panties next.
I have no shame in admitting that I'm happy to give you the view that you desire, now.
As a kitsune, I thought it would've been too on the nose to wear socks and gloves. But you must admit the look is rather cute, neh?
So... did you enjoy that I saved my socks for last? It makes me look rather foxy, neh?
Oh... g-goodness. I suppose it is me.
Eep! What a misfortune and so early!
Ah... please don't take my poor play personally. I wish nothing less than for you to enjoy this.
I hope that my next removal will compensate for my inability to play well. I wish only to provide a positive and pampering experience. I hope this is appreciated, then!
Ah, darn! I thought I had it that time.
Oh, darn it! Just when I'd imagined things were turning my way.
Ah... well then. It's not that I'm terribly shy as much as I wish I could give you a better match.
A prize given freely is certainly a prize, but didn't you select me to compete? I wish I were a more worthy opponent to complete your experience.
You really ought to be nicer to your demigods. Look at the kindness I'm about to show to you as proof!
While I've only fallen prey to traps once or twice, a woman's wiles transcend physical form...
...Perhaps I ought to take my socks off and try to regain my composure.
I've come too far not to see my gambit through, but...
Well played. You've certainly earned the complete view. I think your pampering is nearly complete... but only nearly.
It's truly the finishing touches that make a pampering special.

You say that as though being taken care of such a bad thing. While everyone should strive to be self-sufficient, there's too much to be done in this world for all of us to be cooking and folding clothes.
I will admit to some surprise at how forward a demon is being on behalf of someone else.
I'm a bit hesitant to read your intentions. Demons so rarely ask on behalf of others, or with positive moments.
Though I may be small and "bonny," I've lived over 800 human years. I could teach you a thing or two about humans.
Goodness. I have children older than you, my lady Galatea. Don't be deceived by my stature...
As for whether it's common... It depends on the fox demigod herself, but it's less a sudden and more general need to care for others. A lot of stress comes and goes here, you know?

As I said, I'm here to help people relieve stress. The rest of it, well... I think it's fairly obvious. I want people to like my appearance as it is, but certainly part of pampering is enjoying what you're looking at. Myohm~!
If defeated, I do fully look forward to the opportunity to release, but it does nobody any good were I to be a poor sport and trivial opponent.
Well, do you have any suggestions for an old lady like myself, Polly?
It's hard to pamper a greedy heart...
I do appreciate offerings, but they should be done purely in earnestness.
I'm certain ~player~ is rather more interested in watching us be intimate than killing each other...
I'd be more than happy to engage with you physically, in hopes of bringing you joy... I believe ~player~ would much prefer that to any death. Wouldn't you, ~player~?
Myon~... I suppose I can be a good guest and take my shoes off, first.
The least I can do is remove my shoes, hm?
Hmph. And of all the days to tie it so tightly.
I will attempt to work out my frustration on this knot. I believe my distress should at least be a small comfort.
Forgive my outburst of negativity. I'm simply unaccustomed to being bested at bluffing games.
Were it that another kitsune were here, you might have had a better competition... but if it's my body you wish to see, I hope that will serve as a consolation prize.
Ah... though you probably care a bit more about my tail than my candor or talent...?
Perhaps you're giving me a gift in your way. Humility is certainly an excellent prelude to indulgence... an unearned delight is surely the best...
While I'm not the most buxom of my peers, surely you picked me for a reason.
The one disadvantage of modern undergarb. This infernal facet. I have endeavored to make this form more... fluffy in areas of interest for you, you know.
I'm a bit overcome with embarrassment... but I hope this only adds to the appeal...
Ah... perhaps I've been a bit too confident. Would a small amount of embarrassment have added to this experience?
Ah... here we go. Hm... perhaps you'd rather a view of my tail?
Hm... perhaps I should simply turn around and show you my tail? Would that be something novel and exciting?
Please give me a moment to make sure these are folded and put away gently...
Ah... I'll put these away. While the ~background.surface~ is surely... well-loved, I wish to keep things organized.
While the cold fire of electricity is one of my favorite modern inventions, I must say that the cotton and elastic panties of the era are far more comfortable than any prior.

Water that heats itself and dishes that can be cleaned without laying a finger on them are doubtless my favorite displays of human ingenuity. However, the era's undergarb are quite comfortable as well.
Myon~... Please enjoy this banquet for the eyes.
Ah... please take this opportunity to feast your eyes. You may get a chance to feast on a dish of your choice later, as well.
Fufufu~ If you wish, you may consider how lovely it would be to rest your head on my chest.
I have some final tricks tucked into my tail, but my tail isn't the only part of me you might consider fluffing, myon~.
Ah... I'm actually rather excited for you to see all of me. Well, besides my toes, I suppose.
I suppose some views never overstay their welcome, neh? I may be able to change my shape somewhat, but some things never change.
Some things really do get better with age, don't you think?
While I'm certain that my feet aren't terribly impressive, you are entitled to a preview of what may come next. If you can make me lose another hand, at least... fufufu~
You can see so much more when I'm not standing, hm? Consider this a small bonus to go along with my socks.
How invigorating this game is! But, I believe I'll settle in as a good guest.
Not terribly different than stepping foot in a home... but I have a feeling I'll be missing my sandals soon, anyway.
I'm still a little caught up on the need to prevent Lady Futo from desecrating shrines. I think I'll take that off your mind before I worry about your need for inebriation, Prince.
Though, perhaps you're only a few generous gestures away from purifying that murderous darkness in you, hm?
Oh! Are you trying to change for ~player~? Even buried in all that darkness, I'm sure there's a lovely young girl who only wants to protect ~player~.
Though, if you still view me as quite young, I have yet more practice to do as far as shapeshifting goes.
I see that you don't quite believe me. But... perhaps that's a fault of my own lack of prowess in shapeshifting.
I'm a demigod of nature and hospitality, but caring for people is my specialty. I'm quite powerful in my old age. ...Though admittedly I've only bothered to work on my shapeshifting recently.

Perhaps when you're talking about goals, you're the one looking for release... or perhaps embrace? There are other worlds and games you could be playing with ~player~ if victory was all that mattered, you know.
Oh, well. At my age you learn to enjoy the attention when you can get it, I suppose!
Well, I know it was hardly impressive, but we do have an entire game to play, myon~!
W-well! You get a better view of my legs, at the very least.
P-perhaps my legs and fluffy tail might distract you and enable me to win the next hand?
...Then again, it is strip poker. Perhaps this is a decent enough prize unto itself. I can at least comfort you with this pristine view of my tail.
Ah... maybe I'm too old for a game such as this. I would offer my tail, but the rules of this venue state that touching is forbidden, and I abide by the rules and laws of the land.
T-though... I certainly hope that you can respect the view before you. While I am rather experienced, it's not itself an experience I gift to many.
Few are so brazen as to ask a fox demigod to pillow down with them, but I respect the ambition, at the very least. Please enjoy the view, as they say.
I put quite a lot of work into this form, you know. Please let me know if you find it acceptable.
Perhaps, given the work that went into this form, I was expecting to play just a bit better. Not to be a sore loser, but perhaps I could use some complimenting and pampering of my own?
Well... no more tricks left. But I suppose honesty is its own reward. And I'm honestly a little excited. In an intimate way.
Y-you know, the sting of defeat can probably be massaged away. I'm relatively approachable in terms of intimate matters, but I'm mostly sorry I couldn't give you a better game.
Nudity is not so strange, though I suppose an old lady with a tail is not, I assume, what you see typically.
Why, yes, I am a neat 48kg, of which my tail is nearly 5kg.
While I've mastered compliments and soothing words as a matter of course, perhaps there's something you might want to say to me to broaden my knowledge?
You may choose to compliment me. Nice words ease the spirit, and encourage reciprocity...
Ah... it feels quite good to stretch the toes. Not that you can see them yet...!
If you find my socks curious, you may indulge yourself by looking them. Please simply make that the extent of your appreciation.
Please make your observation the extent of your appreciation. They're simply socks, are they not?
My, oh my... it so happens that without my hakama, you have an excellent view of my legs and tail. And the rest is doubtless curious to your imagination... hm?
As a kitsune, a bit of misdirection and mystery alike can prove quite stimulating, hm? For instance, this thin apron hiding my legs, tail, and who knows what else.
Ah... well, I hope this view is one you can enjoy in lieu of a home-cooked meal or fresh sheets. Though, perhaps you can still earn those as well, neh?
It is a risque game. You're welcome to compliment my display, though it's not quite the same as a compliment on my cooking or cleaning prowess.
My, oh my... is there something wrong? I'm no great beauty, but I hope this form is sufficiently mature for you.
Ah... I know that look. But it's so rare that I get to return it in kind. Please. Enjoy this moment between us.
Goodness. There's nothing wrong with nudity, provided we all approach each other with respect. But if thinking this is forbidden helps you enjoy it...
Ah... it does feel rather liberating. I know my tail is likely my best and fluffiest asset, but there are other places that can make me myon~
Now... whatever comes next? Perhaps me.
After 800 years, you realize that you can be different people to different situations. But the one constant is that you should indulge and enjoy selfless pleasures.
Goodness, aren't you a handsome young man!
My oh my... you're quite strong for a young gentleman your age!
Are you certain you don't want me to get them washed and restitched? They're quite fine for your frame, but a bit of care goes quite a long way!
Goodness, are you sure you wouldn't want me to hold onto your clothing? I'm quite good at tending to stitching, washing, and so forth.
I have to ask... Luck seems to be your lady, does she not?
Ah... Fate, do you have a particular mistress, or is Luck your lady?
Fate, you're enjoying yourself most throughly, aren't you?
Are you having fun, Fate?
Besides nice possessions... what other forms of pampering might you wish to indulge in?
Are you having fun, Fate?
How do you imagine I'd look in Bilgewater apparel?
The Birgewater aesthetic is quite a nice change of pace...
Goodness, Bobobo. I can imagine your hair would be an--
No tail...? Hm... what kind of animal spirit are you?
Oh! What kind of spirit are you? The ears give you away.
You're certainly a spirit... but you're not some manner of vengeful ghost, are you?
Ah... I know spirits similar to you. But... you're not going to try and avenge your untimely death tonight, are you?
Ah, good game to you, Prince.
Well, Prince, it is good as always to see you.
What is this horrible aura I sense...
Oh...! What's... what's this darkness? What manner of pain are you in, Susie?
I don't expect the Prince to recognize a simple fox as myself, Mistress Tojiko.
Mistress Tojiko, I can hardly expect the Prince to remember a simple fox.
My! Your hair's simply gorgeous. Are you a warrior princess of some sort?
Goodness! Your hair's extremely beautiful. Are you a princess of some sort?
Laevatein, would you like me to mend your armor? It's quite fine, but has seen many battles, hasn't it?
Ah... I'm sorry, Laevatein. You have an aura of uncertainty about you. I draw a great deal of satisfaction from helping people feel comforted.
Ah, Prince, would you mind if I pampered Lady Tojiko?
I know this is somewhat forward, but Lady Tojiko, might I pamper you?
I have to say, whether you're a kami guarding that statue or something else, you've picked a beautiful form.
Galatea, are you a kami guarding the statue, or is the statue your being?
You have such a profound sense of darkness about you...
So much darkness and bloodthirst. You poor girl.
Goodness! You have such a bright aura, Lux!
Lux, your aura is so brilliant...!
You're the avatar of a universal system of scholarship, aren't you?
Goodness! You're an avatar, of knowledge, aren't you?
Laevatein... you seem so unaccostomed to having someone take care of you...
You don't often actually have a person tend to you needs, do you?
I can sense a great deal of tranquility within you. You're a healer, aren't you, Angela?
Ah, goodness. I recognize the tranquil aura of a healer.
Dr. Ziegler, would you like to exchange any tips? You're doubtless due for some pampering, and I am always happy to learn about more modern medical techniques.
The occasion to tend to a demon has been decidedly rare... not in centuries. Would a cup of hot tea, or perhaps a cozy blanket help set your heart at ease?
The dark shoals of your soul, Chara, could use some lightness. Would you like a cup of hot chocolate? Perhaps a soothing book?
I hope you understand that even if this is a rather lewd place, I would happily give you any comfort you desire, Laevatein.
Goodness, what will humans think of next...
Ah... my oh my... what ingenuity people will display...
Goodness! A tie!? How extraordinary!
My oh my! A tie!
Ties are quite rare, aren't they? What a memorable moment!
Tie me up...? Well... I suppose-- oh! The game is tied! Ah... much, much different.
Goodness. You're flattering an older lady, you know.
Oh, don't be so modest. I'm far older than I look.
Ah, well. I applaud your devotion to your victory!
Myon~!? Your ~clothing~! How... impressive!
I respect your commitment to winning the game! But even your ~clothing~ can be appealing and pleasing, yes?
Myo~n~! Your ~clothing~ must be quite sentimental to you.
Oh... your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(look|looks)~ so well loved!
A man and his ~clothing~ are easily parted, especially when a kitsune offers to wash them. And I do mean your ~clothing~ and you.
Hm... your ~clothing~ has a certain...
Ah, well. I suppose you'll run out of accessories at some point... who knows what hidden depths you might be hiding something in!
My oh my... Your ~clothing~ is certainly interesting!
Ah... wow... you're still wearing ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|a ~clothing~)~.
I really hope you're enjoying making me look stupid!
I can't masturbate to your ~clothing~, ~name~...
Well, there's something to be said for spunk.
Fufufu~ Well, I admire your sense of tact, but your muscles are still impressive, neh?
I certainly hope you're enjoying yourself, ~name~. I can't imagine any experience with you and your ~clothing~ going any other way.
Do you have a story about your ~clothing~? It's a small thing, but likely no less significant.
If you need, I can clean that up... after the game, of course, I can imagine all of us needing a bath...
I suppose it's something that reminds me of you.
It has just the slightest touch of you about it.
I suppose a man's ~clothing~ needs the same love he does!
Ah, well. I applaud your devotion to your victory!
I'm not exactly impressed, but I still appreciate your impressive play, ~name~.
Don't you worry your handsome head, ~name~. I'll still pamper you all the same.
Well... you have bested me. I suppose playing on your terms is fulfilling...
...Ah, ~name~. Forgive me. I'm just... preoccupied with my... own pampering.
I'm... well. Your ability to play cards is impressive.
Poor girl... do you need a hug? A hot cup of tea? What can I do for you?
My goodness... so much pain and so murky... can I help you? What can I do to help you feel better?
Besides, who could take care of a pampered Prince more than you?
Ah, goodness. So many adornments. Who could take better care of them than you, Tojiko?
Ah! And after I've mended your armor, perhaps I could give you a hot bath? You look like you love a nice, steamy bath!
While I'm sure Prince Miko has mastered certain forms of laying you down, I'd be honored if you gave me the opportunity to care for your otherworldly needs.
I so rarely get the opportunity to grant other spirits their proper rest. Not that I wish to banish you, of course!
Oh... I'm sorry, Galatea. I suppose you're compliment more on your looks than your personality. But if I get to know you, I'm sure I would celebrate you for that.
We all wish to win... but surely there's an indulgence you'd prefer that's a bit less...
Ah... but surely there's something that brings you joy? That makes you happy?
Though, my role here is to help you enjoy even a bit more brightness and lightness.
Though, we can always shine a little brighter with some pampering, can't we?
Goodness! A two-tailed fox is quite experienced... but I've never heard of an animal becoming a human.
This is quite novel to me, Amy. But... a two-tailed fox? He must be quite senior to even me!
I imagine the sore spots you're here to tend to tonight are under your own armor though, neh?
Though... as one lady to another, I imagine you need tender care somewhere very much near your waistline, neh?
Of course! Massage, natural remedies, and all sorts of soul-nourishment are vital, but person who's in need of tender care can't be happy if they're hurt! I'd adore the chance to trade secrets.
Well... I despise the analogy, but if you were to soak in a bath before ~player~ joined you, that would make you the tea, wouldn't it?
Chocolate tea. Perhaps you'd rather enjoy ~player~ licking some warm chocolate off you, too?
Can you promise to teach me how to do this-- t-the game later, just us women?
Y-you really had me, ~name~. And not in the way some people want sometimes...
G-goodness! An accessory! At this point. It's not arousing, nor is it... myo~n~...
I'm always so interested in how women wear their ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothing~s)~.
Goodness! Speaking as a small person, do not underestimate the power within one's frame...!
It's nice that your ~clothing~ looked so good on you. Though... it must be nice to take off your accessories after a long, hard day, neh?
O-Oh! Your ~clothing~... I don't believe it's as cute as... my underwear... but it's still very nice!
Do you find it true that your ~clothing~, and accessories like it, are the things you most easily get attached to, ~name~?
Goodness! ~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ looked so much part of your appearance that I'd hardly considered you may remove it!
I'm not rattled. Like I said, my goal is to provide a good, thorough pampering.
Well, it sure is cute. And cute is what you aim for, ~name~.
Ara ara... small, but mighty, neh?
Miss Hilda... your breasts are rather impressive. Are you perhaps trying to distract your competitors?
Miss Hilda... are you trying to impress everyone with your breasts...? You need not lend yourself so quickly to distraction...
Well, I'm sure you and I are due for many additional interesting conversations, Amy.
Well, Amy, allow me to formally greet you and welcome you to relax while we're here.
Oh, Susie... you don't deserve to be feeling so shadowed. I hope we can make you feel better tonight.
A young woman like you shouldn't be in nearly as much conflict as you are...
I want you to know I take no pleasure in you being bested, Prince.
It would seem you've been... out-foxed, Prince.

Burn some sandalwood, soak you in the tub, and bring you out all warm and refreshed into a soft robe! Has anyone ever done that for you? You certainly look like you could use some attention and comforting.
O-Oh my? Pampering both of you? Simultaneously?
Well. Why don't you introduce yourself as you'd like to be seen, Galatea? And I will happily pamper you to make it so.
~Player~, don't you think we could do something nice for Chara? She's trying so hard to help you win.
Ah... I think I have a few things that are a bit more mundane than winning entirely. ~Player~, won't you help me pamper Chara?
Please do not hesitate to call on me. The very least I can do is tend to your armor.
You just let me know what I can do for you, okay? Would a massage, or buffing your armor help?
I mean no disrespect, but I can tell I'm not the only woman here who's older than she looks. We can appreciate some well-tempered wisdom and honesty, can't we?
You'd be happier if you focused on your bond with ~player~, Chara.
You've sacrificed so much for ~player~... would you enjoy being the prize for once, Chara?
I've seen quite a few things. But a woman's ~clothing.ifPlural(~clothing~|~clothing~s)~~ may change with the times, but never the way she wears it.
I certainly enjoy what I see. Please continue your best of efforts.
Well, they say that no matter how many accessories you wear, the best thing in a woman's wardrobe is her confidence!
...My choice of undergarments is more appealing than ~clothing.ifPlural(some|a)~ mere ~clothing~, yes...?
While I very easily could remove it, I believe it would be better to retain my iconic look and keep my charm in my hair...
Ah... well... I did rather enjoy ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~... but perhaps it's more fun to fold...
O-Oh! It's... goodness. I'm struck by how beautiful you are, regardless of your accessorization!
My oh my! Perhaps it's my state of undress, but... your skill and beauty are quite evident!
...I was more than happy to acknowledge your skill, ~name~... compliments are a form of pampering, after all.
I-I just suppose this leaves you in an adequate place to be taken care of...
Why... g-goodness!
Myon~... Am--I am performing adequately, am I not? W-would a more direct approach have been preferable?
Ah, will you be covering yourself with it? I find the idea quite appealing.
I may be a rather old lady by your standards... but that type of display, of holding your hat over your heavenly spear...
Ah... a nice renegade in need of some love?
Well, impetuous as you are, I find a lawless, rambling sort the best to just pamper senseless.
You seem like a man who needs a bit of the finer things in life. A great hand...
Starting with a nice hand, I imagine you're a man who enjoys a life of luxury, but rarely immerses himself.
Don't you want to take that big, heavy ~clothing~ off? You really ought to settle in. Enjoy the view...
Myon~ and to think that I cook and clean, too...
My oh my... would it help if I hung up your ~clothing~ for you?
While I am an immortal demigod fox, I do have a substantial appreciation for the mortal form.
Normally, I'd pamper a single person... but seeing as I am a single person, I'd love the chance to indulge myself in indulging others...
My hearing is quite sensitive... so I can hear your heartbeat, ~name~...
Oh... we're going for something interesting now, are we? I'll have you know I'm very good at laundry... and massage.
Many fox spirits take on mortal consorts... but you have to be awfully impressive.
Myon! I don't suppose there's a Ms. ~Name~? II there is, please make sure she pampers you!
O-oh...! Well... I am immortal... this means I've picked up quite a few... tricks for pampering, you know.
You may fluff my tail. If it pleases you.
Goodness! You look a bit tesnse. Would you like a hot bath? A massage? A cold cup of alcohol?
The offer to maintain your apparel... or your self... still stands, Fate.
Ohoh~ You could use a lot of care. But let's start with your clothes.
I'm sure I can find some way to make your losses worthwhile.
...Soft robes, lovingly prepared meals, a warm bath overlooking a beautiful sunset... Other things.
I appreciate your contribution to the game, but you know that I don't mind taking care of you...
Life is too short not to enjoy it, neh?
Hm... that's one less thing to stop me from pampering you. Surrender already, if you'd please~
I hope you don't mind an old lady like me flirting with you, ~name~. It's all in good fun, and you should really indulge yourself in a game like this.
Kekeke~ Don't mind me, ~name~. I have many skills. Providing a fun experience is one of them, even if it's harmless.
Ah... well then. Consider it part of the experience. Relax, ~name~. I'd happily bring you a drink.
...Hm... I suppose there's always more to do, isn't there?
The joy of life is that you never stop getting to enjoy even the changes that come about.
I'm right here when you need me, ~name~. All I ask is for your respect.
Good boy.
If you would be so kind as to show off more...
Goodness. Please take care of your ~clothing~, and who knows what may end up taking care of you.
Ah... well, should you need any pampering...
Are you certain? You poor dear.
And I see Mistress Tojiko will also be joining us.
And you as well, Mistress Tojiko.
Ah. Well, I know a thing or two, and I know a woman like you could use some tender love and care!
I hope you don't mind me saying so, but I believe you of all people could use a little pampering.

state.text: So, please. Anything you need. I'm right here for you. Leave your worries with me and let me pamper you.

case.state: Ah. Well, a kitsune comforts, and you share the knowledge of humanity. Both are things of beauty, though I'm truly envious of you.
You aren't exactly human yourself, are you, Penny? You are quite beautiful, though.
You're a beautiful young woman, Penny... but you aren't fully human, are you?
Hm... what types of pampering do you most like, ~name~?
Just imagine it as the end of the day, and you're coming home to a warm meal and a nice, easy night!
Do you think I'd look good in your ~clothing~, ~name~? I've often considered a more modern look.
Please, make sure that whoever Mr. ~Name~ is is as good to you as you are to your ~clothing~, ~name~!
While your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(are|is)~ cute, I think the cutest part of your defeat is yourself.
Since you're taking off your ~clothing~, it seems only fair we make it worth your time.
My primary abilities are domestic... but intimate matters are nonetheless rather important, regardless of... the person, hm?
In having lived 800 years, I've had more than a few encounters with a woman...
Hm... though I do fully appreciate your ~clothing~, I wish you to know the woman underneath holds quite a bit more interest to me at this stage of the game.
At this stage... well, I could use some pampering too... visually, at the very least!
Goodness... look at the effect you're having on me, ~name~...
~Name~... you look quite exceptionally beautiful. And you can always trust a kitsune!
Oh. I see. Hm.
Ah... I suppose that kind of pampering is what you're here for.
I suppose playing with the two of you will be quite the edifying experience.
Ah... well, it's always interesting to hear how a couple pampers each other, as well.
I'm sure you're in for quite the delight during and after this game, Laevatein!
Fufufu~ I can see that you're a woman trying her best. And that means you deserve to be loved, cherished, and taken care of!
We can take it slowly if you like. I'm certain you'll want a warm washcloth at the end of the game, at the very least.
You have knowledge in abundance. Are you here to learn a... ah, practical degree of romance?
Perhaps you're interested in... well. You are at this card game, dear.
My... well... what do you want from this game, dear?
Well, I'm certain no matter what your inclinations are, I'd be happy to help you!
Hm... though your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ interesting, perhaps something like your choice of sushi would yet be more so?
~Clothing~... Hm... I do wonder how it would look like on me. Or... perhaps more traditional apparel for you, to help you feel elegant?
Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(deserve|deserves)~ care, ~name~. But not as much as you!
You're having fun, yes? While not all of life must be abundantly exciting, it is made better by moments like this, myon~?
Well, well! You're provoking such curious reactions, ~name~! Perhaps... there is quite a bit of merit to your approach.
Hm... well... relaxation provides it's own unique opportunities, don't you think so, ~name~?
Goodness... to think you looked pretty before you took off your ~clothing~! You'd best be careful not to pamper me too much, ~name~.
Myon~! Well... I'm more used to physical pampering. But you're certainly teaching me something new, ~name~...!
Myon~! You may wish to keep going. I'm already providing quite a bit of my own pampering to the others, neh?
Ah... your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ quite interesting... something that makes you--hahh--feel good should be considered, hm?
I do know how to maintain a fire... both for cooking... and... just how you're doing, ~name~.
I can fix up your pants, if you'd like. But whatever would we do while you're out of them, I wonder?
Goodness! If you wanted things to get steamy, I could have simply poured you a bath...
O-Oh? Of course. It's merely like coming home at the end of a long day, neh?
G-goodness! I'll make sure to take good care of your ~clothing~.
Well, joining a semi-dressed kitsune is an act of self-care.
Oh... I have a feeling where you'd like to be pampered, hm?
My oh my... we might have to get you into a bath if you're going to get naked. Or perhaps you'd prefer the massage table?
Well, joining a semi-dressed kitsune is an act of self-care.
It was quite a delight when I undressed. I suppose we do owe you the same attention.
Myo~n~!
Ah... I... had been wondering. S-surely curiosity is a normal part of the game, hm?
Myo~n~!
Hyoung--!
Myooo~n~
Hmm-mmh!
Do not be upset simply because I'm still mostly dressed. You will doubtless have further chances to play!
Defeat is part of the experience. Please do not be upset to be behind...
Ah... ~name~. Please tell me you're still having fun!
...I'm being plenty attended to with the view.
Hm... would you be interested in perhaps fluffing my tail?
(~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ would drape over me... would that be cute, though?)
Perhaps you should keep going. Then you might be able to get some particular care.
Goodness. I live to serve, but I think views like this make it much easier.
My oh my... getting quite warm in here? Do you need a cool drink? Or someone to wipe you down?
Poor girl. Here, give me that when you're done with it.
There's no ulterior motives, Laevatein. While I do find you cute, I'm much more interested in your health and wellness than anything you could do for me.
Oh, don't worry, Penny. I can take care of you however you want.
However you'd like me to tend to you, Penny. Don't worry.
Oh my! If it helps, you'll doubtless be on your way to enjoyable new experiences soon!
I've always been fairly good at games, but this is far from my specialty...
Oh! Surely you're just choosing to get more comfortable, ~name~?
Well, well. Do you think you can compete with your elders, ~name~?
Heh.
You're looking a bit like the laundry, ~name~. Ready to be set at rest after you get nice and wet.
This is quite liberating, ~name~. It's nice to see that you're joining me!
My... this may not be a new experience... but there's something appealing in the familiar...
Disrobing your ~clothing~ is the first step to some of the best pampering you can get, ~name~!
Myon~!
Ah... well... sometimes one is the mood for something a bit different, neh?
I will endeavor to bring you a soothing tea and a comfortable blanket for later.
I will return shortly with an herbal tea. And a toasty blanket for later.
Your happiness is more than enough. Even if your breasts are rather cute.
An impressive garb for an impressive young woman.
Goodness... to be young again. Doubtless you're quite primed to deal with the youthful endurance of any companion you'd so choose, neh?
I'll have you know that I'm feeling rather distracted, Hilda.
Goodness. I have children older than you, and yet I find myself distracted. Curse this inhuman libido...
...In many ways, you're more human than I am.
Despite my experiences... you're quite a bit more human than me. It's natural that I'd wish to tend to you.
Well, you do have a few pieces left, don't you? Perhaps I can offer you a massage, later?
Myon~!
While I don't intend to throw the game away, I do want you to know you make defeat look appealing!
A little taunting isn't exactly polite, but it is fun, right?
I'm not certain why, but I am beginning to feel a bit... shy.
It's rather nice to not need to worry about someone else's ~clothing~ except that they remove it.
I'm mostly used to men, but it never hurts to have a range of experiences to draw on.
Ah... aren't you a beautiful sight, ~name~.
Goodness...! The spirit of competition and pampering are encouraging me to be rather bold...
~Name~...
Oh... oh my...
I-is this...? Please continue, ~name~, and appreciate the attention.
Though, perhaps a satisfying meal, then the feeling of having your most heavy of burdens drained to the dregs...
--Easy thing to... to take care of.
Myon~!
I find it amazing how a simple bet can transform a normal event into something so intimate!
I hope you find it affirming that I remain excited to see you undress, ~name~!
Ah, and I thought I was being too subtle.
There we are. Let's get you out of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ restraining ~clothing~ so you can relax.
I'm enjoying the visual pampering already. But why settle? Let's really indulge.
...There's something so wonderful about seeing a man in need of some loving hands.
You've already enjoyed how I look... this is even more motivation to help, ~name~.
Quite handsome. And I've seen my share of handsome men over the years!
Ah... I'd love to touch you...
I could wash you clean... anyway you wanted...
My oh my... and I've been looking forward to this so badly...
I think I'd feel rather pampered in your arms. You are a gentle man, after all.
Well, goodness. I won't say I'm not impressed by a man with arms almost as big as me.
You're making a compelling case to let either of my lips do you justice, hm? Or perhaps you'd prefer to use your beard against mine?
Ah. I'm used to cleaning ears, but your Fist of the Nose Hair is... ah... *Flabbergasted Fox Noises*
I'm a bit too dressed up to pamper you in the way I'd like to, ~name~. Perhaps we should fix that.
Hm... Impressive. But don't you think you're feeling sore? Perhaps you'd like someone skilled at massage to help you unwind?
Oh... goodness. So... tense. Doubtless we'll need to get you to relax. Perhaps in a hands-on fashion.
Handsome. Surely you deserve a nice, relaxing evening after such a hard day, hm?
Oh... there we are. Now this is a view we can enjoy together.
It may take me a moment to get warmed up... but I hope you know I'm not naive about this sort of thing...
I know it's hard to compare to a fox demigod...
Well, well. So much tension. We should find a way to make that melt away, hm?
Ah... look at you, ~name~, working so hard. I'd be happy to help you when the game's over.
Whoever says a man's chest is less interesting than a woman's isn't trying very hard.
Impressive, ~name~... impressive enough to earn some tender loving... care.
Ah... worth the wait, and good... material for the imagination.
800 years and I continue to live for moments like these...
Oh my... so quickly!
Goodness... and I haven't even started to show anything saucy...!
Oh... well, I'm sure you aren't too shaken up, but I do feel bad...
Well... it's nothing I haven't seen before.
I'm over 800 years old. I've seen whatever you have on multiple occasions, I'm sure.
Ah... well, this isn't new, but it's always exciting.
Oh... won't you please pamper me?
My oh my... here we are, an exposed fox demigod and a seduced man...
Some people enjoy reading erotic fiction. Others of us like to live it, neh? What's wrong with fantasy?
And to think, you already have this lovely view.
It's not always the size of the meal, but the love that goes into it, neh?
If you're feeling loved and pampered, feel free to compliment your hostess.
Aw...! It's admirable that you're so self-confident.
I'm a small person. That looks just about my size.
For someone who was out so quickly, you certainly seem eager to prove yourself. I can't possibly imagine why you feel you'd need to.
Oh my! I imagine you have quite a strong technique, hm?
Goodness...! You could certainly use some love, couldn't you?
Oh! Oh! I can do-- E-er... anyone can do a lot more with the smaller ones, you know... finesse is more important than power.
Ah... it's so pleasing... while the bigger ones are fun... well... I bet you appreciate the opportunity a lot more, myon~
Oh... well. I have a rather abundant range of pamperings you can do to me-- with me.
Hm... oh yes. It's perfect for someone like me. My oh my, is it ever.
Well... I can pamper you over and over. I'm already warmed up.
Oh... I can put my experience to work with you, ~name~...
Myon~! I'm rather small too, so... I'll definitely be happy to get you calm and relaxed. Mhm!
The only complaint I have is that's not as near me as I'd like...
Myon~...! What... would you like for dinner? Fish? Hot pot? ...Me?
